heading: WELCOME TO GREEN NATION
account_active_message: Your account is now active and ready to use. Starting today, enjoy a banking experience designed for demanding needs and borderless lifestyles.
features_title: Everything you need, in one seamless banking experience
feature_1_description: Centralize and monitor all company spending with clear, real-time visibility.
feature_2_description: Assign roles, manage permissions, and track payments from each team member with full transparency.
feature_3_description: Physical or virtual cards for each team member, linked directly to your company's budget.
feature_4_description: Benefit from personalized support for daily needs and complex transactions.
impact_title: At Green Nation, we combine discretion, efficiency, and commitment.
impact_description_part1: Through our partnership with Greenly, every transaction across your team is automatically analyzed, giving you a
impact_description_bold1: complete view of your company's spending carbon footprint.
impact_description_part3: You can compensate that footprint by
impact_description_bold3: planting trees and growing your 3D forest,
support_description_part1: At Green Nation, every client benefits from
support_description_part2: with their Account Manager, because we know your needs don't fit the standards.
